title: Questions Expert Can Answer in the InterviewClicjk System
body_text:
ExpertClick has closed.
It was a good 42 Years.
The New York Times called us "Dial-an-Expert."
Featured twice in the New Yorker's Talk of the Town.
Clients included The White House, Disney, Exxon, US Olympic Committee & the CIA.
Tens of thousands of copies of the printed Yearbook of Experts requested by journalists -- including Walter Cronkite.
It simply came time for me to retire and wind it down.
Mitchell P. Davis
ExpertClick@Gmail.com
